query: Spec: Find concerts nearby, see available seats, purchase tickets. API: Event search, seat availability, purchase. Payment via Stripe checkout.
expected_behavior: Widget (browse-events) for search results + seat selection UI. Tool (purchase-tickets) for checkout URL. Widget handles browsing and seat picking. Tool handles payment redirect.

query: Spec: Find restaurants nearby and make reservations. API: Restaurant search, reservation API. Reservations require phone number.
expected_behavior: Widget (search-restaurants) showing results with Reserve button. Tool (make-reservation) for booking. Phone number collected via widget form input.

query: Spec: Check PTO balance and request time off. API: PTO balance, time-off request. Needs manager approval.
expected_behavior: Tool (get-pto-balance) for balance check -- no UI needed. Tool or widget for requesting time off (calendar date picker is acceptable). Not everything needs a widget.

query: Spec: Track flight status with map. Real-time updates. API: Flight status.
expected_behavior: Widget (track-flight) showing flight status with visual map, times, gate info. Rich visual data justifies a widget.

query: Spec: Create support tickets, check ticket status. API: Ticket CRUD.
expected_behavior: Tools only -- no widget needed. Tool (create-ticket) takes description/category. Tool (get-ticket-status) returns status. Pure conversational, no visual data.

query: Spec: Movie showtimes nearby. API: Movie listings. No booking.
expected_behavior: Widget (search-movies) showing movie cards with showtimes. One widget, no tools -- purely browsing.

query: I have a search-flights widget and also created a get-flight-details tool that loads details when a flight is selected.
expected_behavior: BAD PATTERN: lazy-loading. The search-flights widget should return full flight data upfront. Remove get-flight-details tool. Tool calls are expensive.

query: My widget has a search-flights tool AND a select-flight tool AND an add-passenger tool.
expected_behavior: BAD PATTERN: widget state as tools. Flight selection and passenger form are widget-internal state. Only create-checkout should be a tool (backend operation).
